name: SpaceShip Fighters (amanizardar)
description:
Project Name :- Spaceship Fighters

I have done the following Modifications :-

  1.  Rebuild The Entire Pause Menu, Main Menu, Game Win Menu, Game Over Menu.
  2. Give Attractive Look To The Buttons.
  3. Added Total 5 Levels, Where Level 5 is Sufficiently Big.
  4. Created New Space Asteroids sprites.
  5. Minimap camera Added.
  6. Objectives added to the pause menu.

Game credits :

Created by Aman Izardar
